sentences.sContent: The Prince had shocked society by living openly with his mistress.
sentences.sCn: 王子和他的情妇公开同居，让社会大为震惊。

synos.tran: 情妇；女主人；主妇；女教师；女能人

remMethod.val: mistr(音似： Mr) ＋ ess(女性) → 属于男人的女人 → 情妇； 主妇， 女主人

trans.tranCn: 情妇； 主妇， 女主人
trans.tranOther: a woman that a man has a sexual relationship with, even though he is married to someone else
